AWS DevOps Professional Test Mode

AWS DevOps Professional Practice Test

This practice test simulates the actual AWS Certified DevOps Engineer - Professional exam.

Exam Format

  • Number of Questions: 75 questions
  • Duration: 180 minutes (3 hours)
  • Question Types: Multiple choice and multiple answer

Exam Content

The exam focuses on advanced technical skills and knowledge in the following domains:

  • SDLC Automation (22%)
  • Configuration Management and Infrastructure as Code (19%)
  • Monitoring and Logging (15%)
  • Policies and Standards Automation (10%)
  • Incident and Event Response (18%)
  • High Availability, Fault Tolerance, and Disaster Recovery (16%)

Test Features

  • Pause/Resume: You can pause the test up to 10 times
  • Navigation: You can move back and forth between questions
  • Time Tracking: A timer shows your remaining time
  • Domain Analysis: Detailed results by domain area
Important Information
This test is designed to simulate the real exam experience. Once you start, the timer will begin counting down. You can pause the test if needed, but you are limited to 10 pauses to maintain exam-like conditions.
